contest-event.event-date:
Aug. 20, 1949 D Stenalees Contest (Open Section)
Stenalees Contest (Open Section) 10 Test Piece Contest Stenalees Contest stenalees-contest-open-section
None
Recollections of Beethoven [arr. Greenwood]
Stenalees, Cornwall Prelude - 1st Truro 87, 2nd Bugle 79, 3rd Mount Charles, 4th divided Indian Queens and St Stythians. Best cornet - F.E.Braund (Truro). Best euphonium - J.Yelland (Indian Queens. Best trombone - J.Clife (Truro). 5 bands competed.
Feb. 13, 2014, 3:59 p.m. March 1, 2019, 1:22 p.m.
1 Bugle Silver Band W. G. Bennetts
2 Truro City A. W. Parker
3 Mount Charles Brass Band A. E. Grant
4 St. Stythians Band E. Floyd
5 Indian Queens Silver Ford Knight
Withdrawn St Newlyn East Unknown
